017package org.parboiled.annotations;
018
019import org.parboiled.Context;
020import org.parboiled.Rule;
021
022import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
023import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
024import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
025import java.lang.annotation.Target;
026
027/**
028 * Annotation that can be used on parser methods returning {@link Rule} objects.
029 * Instructs parboiled to not create a parse tree node for this rule. The parse tree nodes of all subrules are
030 * directly attached to the parent of this rule (or more correctly: the first ancestor not carrying @SkipNode).
031 * Note that, even though a rule carrying @SkipNode does not create a parse tree node of its own and is therefore
032 * "invisible" in the parse tree, the rule still exists as a regular rule in the rule tree and is accompanied by
033 * a "regular" rule {@link Context} during rule matching.
034 */
035@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
036@Target({ElementType.METHOD})
037public @interface SkipNode {
038}
